know-me.title: Who am I?
know-me.p1: I'm a techie with knowledge about programming, networking and that kind of IT nerd stuff, also interested in physics and mathematics.
know-me.p2: Sci-fi series and movies huge fan (And of course our beloved masters, the cats), you can call me a nerd. I'm also a gamer, specifically of RPG, shooter and arcade ones.
know-me.p3: Always looking to learn and try something new. I like challenges. Have I already metioned that I love cats?

skills.title: What do I know?
skills.p1: I've learnt about IT things mostly academically and by myself. I've studied a Telematics Degree and Cybersecurity Master's Degree.
skills.p2: Been working as a developer for a couple of years and currently challenging myself as systems administrator, specialized in kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines.
skills.p3: I'm also working on side projects like smart plug controlling and Telegram automation bots (follow me on GitHub)
